head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths REESE, JOSEPH M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths REESE, JOSEPH M.

block.p: REESE-Joseph M. On August 4, 2000. Beloved son of Clara and the late Joseph J. Devoted brother of Marion Taylor, Elaine Nicholson, Joan Cegelka and Ronald. Also survived by numerous nieces and nephews. Former employee of Vincent & Farrell Associates, member of 115th Precinct Council, Founder and President of Alpine Tenants Association, member of Jackson Heights Neighbor Association, former Board member of Community Board #
